hackathon-description-text: Snowday '17 is a 12 hour hackathon hosted by Project Cipher. Hackathons provide a venue for self-expression and creativity through technology. You will come together, form teams around a problem or idea, and collaboratively code a unique solution from scratch. Don't worry if this is your first hackathons, Snowday is built for beginners and the experienced, they'll be mentors and workshops to help you get hacking. Snowday is your opportunity to learn some cool shit, make some dope friends, and win some awesome prizes.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Amazon Echo Dot + LIFX Smart Light Bulbs

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=2 Wellington St W, Brampton, ON L6Y 1M8, Canada

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Overall Best Idea in Innovation and Viability
Overall Best Idea in Innovation and Viability with the assistance of a Mentor
A project that took advantage of economic development's tech!
How many "LOL"s can you get out of the judges?
